title: Can not log into new client
body:
I recently updated to the new client and have been trying to log into my account but it keeps giving me an error message. When I tried my smurf, it could log in perfectly fine, so I'm not sure as to why I can't log in to my main account. I've linked the error message, http://puu.sh/u9KlL/6d784308ef.png.
Any help would be appreciated.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you still experiencing this issue?
Is the account you're posting under the same account you're having issues logging in with?
